messageContentWrapperStyle: text-align: center; color:#003764; margin: auto; position: center;
headerStyle: font-family: 'Open Sans'; font-size: 32px; font-weight: bold; color: #003764;
paragraphStyle: display: table; margin: auto; font-family: Verdana, Arial; text-align: justify; text-align-last: left; color: #003764;
tableStyle: font-family: Open Sans; margin: 16px auto; width: 50%; border-collapse: collapse; box-shadow: 0 0 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15); border-radius: 5px;
buttonStyle: background-color: #009ade; color: #FFFFFF; border: 0; border-radius: 5px; padding: 16px 24px; margin-top: 24px; text-align: center; text-decoration: none; font-family: 'Open Sans'; font-size: 20px; font-weight: bold; cursor: pointer; box-shadow: 0 0 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15);
